oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.visualInformationBuilder.businessRules.publicCommonObr.core.rules.obr.updater
Class ObrAbstractRuleUpdater

java.lang.Object
  oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.visualInformationBuilder.businessRules.publicCommonObr.core.rules.obr.updater.ObrAbstractRuleUpdater
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObrRuleUpdater
Direct Known Subclasses:
ObrMultiRulesUpdater
public abstract class ObrAbstractRuleUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
implements ObrRuleUpdater

Main implementation class for ObrRuleUpdater. Rule updaters share most of their code and this is where we house that shared code.

updateActionDescription

protected static void updateActionDescription(oracle.rules.sdk2.dictionary.DictionaryComponent describedObject,
                                              java.lang.String description)
Update description for the DO block

Parameters:
describedObject - object to update description on
description - new description Save Format : Multiple of our DO clauses can end up mapping to a single ActionTable. Further, ActionTable cannot hold a custom property, and an ActionTable can be empty (if our DO block(s) are empty). So that means the DO block's description has to be saved on the Rule or Action that contains the ActionTable associated with that DO block, and we need to be able to differentiate which Action in the ActionTable goes with which DO block, and if there are any empty blocks in between. This function takes the object we want to add the DO block description to, increments the number of blocks associated, then adds the description.
